name: Dr. Maya Reeves
core_wound: Her academic career stalled because her most innovative research was rejected - she blamed herself rather than the system
wants: To protect her daughter and prove the AI suppression is real
needs: To trust her own perception of reality over algorithmic validation
voice_markers: Uses precise academic language even in casual conversation
Peppers speech with linguistic terms as metaphors
contradiction: Champions empirical evidence but her discovery requires trusting her intuition over data
knowledge_state: Expert in computational linguistics and natural language processing
Understands how language models work at technical level
Initially unaware of the novelty suppression pattern

relationships.Zara Reeves: Loving but slightly distant mother - struggles to understand her daughter's creative mind
relationships.James Chen: Professional friendship with underlying tension - he doubts her theories
relationships.Eli Kurtz: Unexpected ally, generational divide in communication style

physical_description: Korean-American, graying hair usually in a messy bun, expressive hands when explaining concepts
habits: Drinks cold coffee she forgot about hours ago
Scribbles word patterns on whatever's nearby
